NHSNInfectionTypeCode

Code System: cdcNHSN 2.16.840.1.113883.6.277 or SNOMED CT 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96

A full listing of codes can be found in the hai_voc.xls file provided with this package.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    19824006Skin or Soft Tissue Infection
    50417007Lower respiratory Infection
    68566005Urinary Tract Infection
    91302008Systemic Infection
    128116006Infection of the Central Nervous System
    128402005Infection of the cardiovascular system
    312158001Gastrointestinal Infection
    431193003Bloodstream Infection
    433202001Surgical Site Infection
  • Include these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.277
    CodeDisplay
    1792-1MDRO Infection
    1795-4CDAD Infection
    1796-2Infection of the Reproduction System
    1797-0Infection of the Ear/Eyes/Nose or Throat
    1798-8Bone or Joint Infection
    2340-3Ventilator Associated Event
